text: ۞وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ مِنَّا فَضۡلٗاۖ يَٰجِبَالُ أَوِّبِي مَعَهُۥ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ ٱلۡحَدِيدَ

translation.en: And We certainly gave David from Us bounty. [We said], "O mountains, repeat [Our] praises with him, and the birds [as well]." And We made pliable for him iron
translation.id: Dan sungguh, Telah Kami berikan kepada Dawud karunia dari Kami. (Kami berfirman), "Wahai gunung-gunung dan burung-burung! Bertasbihlah berulang-ulang bersama Dawud," dan Kami telah melunakkan besi untuknya
